messages.message:
Homepage design - If you’re first time user on AI Hub, and you know you can Converse with Docs uploaded by you.
You might log in and see this search box and think: _“okay, that’s where I ask the question, but where do I upload my doc?”_
i believe this was considered during the homepage refresh design with an intentional focus on highlighting search and equally distributing attention on other ai hub objects for returning users
cc: @Varun Jain re: chat/search. I agree it's not obvious that you can start a chat where you can upload a doc and get insights.
